name: Steampunk Text Adventure
description:
Step into a new world, using your terminal! 

This is a simple text adventure game written in C#,  made for our Project Management class at AP.

The game is currently still a work in progress, if you have any feedback please let us know!

Made by:

  • Jonathan Tayar
  • Shourov Ahmed
  • Vanommeslaeghe Gie
